content: what s cuter than a tiny christmas tree you ask why a knit one of course just in time for the holiday season this little guy knits up fast if you re looking for a last-minute gift for someone or if you re looking for a quick knit while you watch the latest netflix holiday rom-com this pattern is also fantastic if you re trying to use up that last bit of your leftover yarn the decorative beading is entirely optional and in my opinion the piece looks just a beautiful without **enjoy this pattern silver bells is just one third of a set of tree cones in the tree lot an original pattern published by ritsknitsdesign you can find the rest of the design here 1 ** enjoy this free pattern until december 31st 2018 happy knitting and happy holidays 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/tree-lot
